resources.string: Pittsburgh Post-Gazette endorses Trump, first GOP candidate since 1972 - New York Post
The Pittsburgh Post-Gazette endorsed President Trump in the 2020 election — citing his economic accomplishments and handling of trade with China — marking the first time since 1972 that…
